summary: A few retextures for the Vampire Royal Armor.  Male only at the moment.
descriptionHtml:
I was kind of unsatisfied with the current Vampire Royal Armor, so I learned how to retexture and use the CK and voila.

This mod adds 3 standalone retextures to Hestla in the Volkihar Castle:

- Green + gold armor
- Orange + black armor
- Orange + green armor

They\'re unenchanted. 

I plan to retexture the boots & gloves as well and some other color schemes. If anyone wants different colors, feel free to request or if you want a female version.
author: aditza35
